review_data.title: Nice vietnam food within walking distance from zurich train station
review_data.content: We ordered the grilled pork rice with egg, the shrimp with rice and rice noodle soup with shrimp and pork. Both rices are nice and delicious. The noodle soup may be a bit salty.

review_data.title: Beste vietnamesische «Banh Mi»-Sandwiches in Zürich!

review_data.title: Leckere Suppe
review_data.content: Echt gute Suppe zu einem sehr fairen Preis. Spartanisches Restaurant, sehr nette Bedienung. Mit wohl recht authentischem Essen.

review_data.title: Real Tastes of Vietnam
review_data.content: Delicious. Pho Bo is really good. At lunch there is a popular Thai buffet. It does all look delicious. There’s a bit of a price shock compared to Vietnam but Zürich loves to shock in that way.

review_data.title: Good decent Pho in Zurich

review_data.title: Small treasure of Vietnamese cuisine

review_data.title: Best Pho in ZRH
review_data.content: I think i tried every Pho in ZRH and this one is the best. Best Pho Bo in ZRH. Super friendly people. Always a pleasure to come back

review_data.title: Great authentic vietnamese food at good price
review_data.content: Great vietnamese small restaurant near the main train station (5min walk). It's a very small place with no more than 20 places. It's entirely Vietnamese food (entries - main dish - desserts) and you can have an authentic experience with delicious food at "Pho Na"....More

review_data.title: Authentic Vietnamese Noodle Soups
review_data.content: I had the Pho with Chicken (19CHF), which was authentic and cooked individually as diners entered the restaurant. Would come back for another try of the other Vietnamese noodles!

review_data.title: Excellent lunch!
review_data.content: Excellent and delicious Vietnamese lunch! They have also the famous Vietnamese soups service was fast and warm welcome. I recommend this restaurant! Take away also. Congratulations See you next. Ritz Pascal

review_data.title: Good food, GF is bonus
review_data.content: We found a good restaurant ~10 min away from HB Zurich. GF option is very limited in Zurich, and Asian places are blessing. We found this Vietnamese restaurant at Josefstrasse with choses of rice, rice and bean noodles. The traditional Pho soup was fresh, it...More

review_data.title: Wohlfühl-Imbiss
review_data.content: Diesen vietnamesischen Imbiss hatten wir einst zufällig entdeckt und sind bis heute begeistert. Das Essen ist ausgesprochen gut und frisch,...More

review_data.title: Best Pho Bo in Switzerland
review_data.content: Never had a better Pho outside of Vietnam. Great soup, great meat, great service! The other dishes are tasty too, try Banh Xeo, it's yummy.

review_data.title: Basic but great food
review_data.content: Found this restaurant on Tripadvisor. My wife being from Vietnam and I loved the food here. Friendly owner.

review_data.title: Need a Pho fix?
review_data.content: Here's a neat little Vietnamese-in-name (not certain but I thought I detected Thai accents floating about?...could be wrong here!) corner-shop operation. It's spic'n'span, tucked away in a little-visited-by-most-visitors-to-Zurich part of the inner-city, but an easy walk or tram ride away from the main railway station.....More

review_data.title: Super value lunch
review_data.content: Tasty and filling vietnamese food in this simple eatery with friendly service. Quick and good for lunch.

Soups are a taaaaaaad bit pricey, but that's Zurich. I would probably come much more frequently at the...More

review_data.title: Authentic food, large portions, convenient prices
review_data.content: You've visited Vietnam and want to recall the soups and places you've experienced on a boardwalk in HCMC? This is probably the closest you'll get in Züri. We've been here 3 times since it opened and had soups every time. CHF17.5 for a large bowl...More

review_data.title: Large servings and a good, cheap lunch option
review_data.content: Located just a few blocks from the main train station, this Vietnamese specialty restaurant has a friendly staff of young ladies that speak English and German. Along with their regular menu selections for lunch and dinner, there are about 12 items on display for lunch...More

review_data.title: Friendly - Happy
